law.catch_line: Rewards for apprehension of persons setting fires.
law.text: The secretary for energy and environment may offer rewards out of moneys, appropriated to the Energy and Environment Cabinet, for information leading to the apprehension and conviction of persons violating the laws relating to the setting of fires and forest fire control.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 152, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 50(3), effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(3). -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 52.
